import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";

import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Bulk delete linked assets"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"delete"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/assets/linked/to"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Removes multiple parent-child asset relationships in a single request. Unlike the single-parent delete endpoint, this allows unlinking assets across different parents.

**Prerequisites**
1. **Link identifiers** - For each relationship to remove, provide the `ParentAssetId` and `ChildAssetId`.

**Workflow Example**
1. Identify the linked asset relationships to remove.
2. [DELETE /api/v1.0/assets/linked/to](/docs/api/assets/bulk-delete-linked-assets) with an array of LinkedAsset objects.

**Minimal Required Fields**: Array of objects with `ParentAssetId` and `ChildAssetId`.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","description":"Represents a parent-child relationship between two assets. Used to link accessories, peripherals, or components to a main asset.","properties":{"ParentAssetId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"UUID of the parent asset in the relationship"},"ChildAssetId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"UUID of the child asset being linked"},"CreatedDate":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"Date and time when the link was created"},"Description":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Optional description of the relationship"}},"required":["ParentAssetId","ChildAssetId"],"title":"LinkedAsset"},"title":"LinkedAssetListRequest"},"example":[{"ParentAssetId":"11111111-2222-3333-4444-555555555555","ChildAssetId":"aaaaaaaa-bbbb-cccc-dddd-eeeeeeeeeeee"},{"ParentAssetId":"22222222-3333-4444-5555-666666666666","ChildAssetId":"bbbbbbbb-cccc-dddd-eeee-ffffffffffff"}]}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
